fields.label: Synack Modules Styles and Scripts Option Toggle
fields.name: synack_modules_styles_and_scripts_option_toggle
fields.instructions: Check this option to add additional styles and scripts

sub_fields.label: CTA Button Opens In New Tab
sub_fields.name: cta_button_opens_in_new_tab
sub_fields.message: Check if CTA button link should open new browser tab

sub_fields.label: Module Thumbnail Position Toggle Left
sub_fields.name: module_thumbnail_position_toggle_left
sub_fields.message: Check this box to display the image to the left

sub_fields.label: Hero Use Thumbnail Image
sub_fields.name: hero_use_thumbnail_image
sub_fields.message: Check this box to display thumbnail image

sub_fields.label: Show Module CTA
sub_fields.name: show_module_cta
sub_fields.message: Checked will show the CTA button options

sub_fields.label: Image Left or Right
sub_fields.name: image_left_or_right
sub_fields.instructions: Choose whether to so show image on the left.

sub_fields.label: Media Left or Right
sub_fields.name: media_left_or_right
sub_fields.instructions: Choose whether to so show media on the left.

sub_fields.label: WYSIWYG Editor ID
sub_fields.name: wysiwyg_editor_id
sub_fields.instructions: Add custom ID for your own styling. Learn naming convention rules and limitations here.

sub_fields.instructions: Add custom ID for your own styling. Learn naming convention rules and limitations here.
